summary: This mod fixes the missing textures on skyrim HD pack Chopping Blocks and replaces the ugly textures of Wood Fires.
descriptionHtml:
This mod fixes the missing textures on skyrim HD pack Chopping Blocks and replaces the ugly textures of Wood Fires.

Revision 1.1: Added Paarthurnax texture fix and new HD textures for chopping block/wood fires.

NOTE: If you cannot see the fix, try changing the load order of this mod and put it after Bethesda\\\'s Resource Files (Official High-Res Patch, Dawnguard)

HighResTexturePack01.esp
HighResTexturePack02.esp
Chopping blocks/Wood Fires FIX.esp

Incompatibilities: None that I know of. I noticed weird overlapping textures of fires (depending on the distance) if you use the mod Dynamic Fires, but that also happens with vanilla textures, so not a problem of this mod in particular.

*** This is a mod I had uploaded to the Steam workshop a long time ago and since a lot of pepole has been asking for DL links for it I decided to upload it here on the nexus.
author: Dragonborn77
